intro: Notylia laxiflora, commonly known as the slender-flowered notylia, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, white to pale pink flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are typically opposite and have a smooth, glossy surface. Notylia laxiflora is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forest understories.
